alert.note: Alert for Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:52PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Marengo County through 730 PM CDT... At 652 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Freddie Jones Field to near Nanafalia. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Sweet Water, Freddie Jones Field, Shawnee, Nanafalia, Magnolia, Wayne, Surginer, Miller, Dixons Mill, Vineland, Half Acre, Octagon, Clayhill, Nicholsville and Calvary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
